fabric_conditioner.name: Fabric Conditioner Kit
fabric_conditioner.description: Complete kit to prepare premium fabric conditioner similar to Comfort brand with excellent fragrance

steps.title: Initial Water Mix
steps.instruction: Pour 10 liters of RO water in the large bucket. Pour 'Fabric Softener' into it and mix it well using a plastic stick

steps.title: Rest Period
steps.instruction: Leave it for 6 hours after mixing well. (You can mix it once every 1 hour)

steps.title: Add Remaining Water
steps.instruction: After 6 hours, it will now turn into a 'paste'. Pour the remaining 10 liters of RO water into it

steps.title: Dissolve the Paste
steps.instruction: Use a plastic stick and mix it for a while until it dissolves well

steps.title: Prepare Color Mix
steps.instruction: Mix the 'color powder' with 1/4 liter of RO water

steps.title: Add Scent
steps.instruction: Pour 'SCENT' into the mixture and mix it well

steps.title: Add Color Gradually
steps.instruction: Pour the mixed 'color powder' solution (1/4 liter of water) into the main mixture little by little in the amount needed, while mixing it

steps.title: Final Product
steps.instruction: The 'Fabric Conditioner' (Like Comfort) that gives a good fragrance is now ready

recipe.final_result: 20 liters of premium fabric conditioner with excellent fragrance

liquid_detergent_ultra.name: Liquid Detergent 'ULTRA' (Washing Gel Liquid 'Ultra')
liquid_detergent_ultra.description: Premium liquid detergent kit for high-quality washing gel production

steps.title: Prepare Water Buckets
steps.instruction: Pour 2 liters of RO water into the large bucket, and then another 2 liters of water into the small bucket

steps.title: Mix Caustic Solution
steps.instruction: In the small bucket (2 liters of water), stand back, pour 'caustic' and stir for a while until it dissolves using only a plastic stick

steps.title: Add Auxiliaries
steps.instruction: Pour the 2 'auxiliaries' from the 2-liter can into the large bucket (2 liters of water) and stir for a while

steps.title: First Rest Period
steps.instruction: Leave both buckets as they are for 3 hours

steps.title: Combine Solutions
steps.instruction: After 3 hours, pour the 'Caustic Clay' mixed in the small bucket into the large bucket (containing the auxiliaries and water), little by little, and keep mixing it well with a plastic stick

steps.title: Add SLES Paste
steps.instruction: Mix the 'SLES paste' into the large bucket and mix it well

steps.title: Add CAPP
steps.instruction: Pour the 'CAPP' in the 1 liter can into it and mix it well. It will now turn into a paste

steps.title: Add Scent
steps.instruction: Pour the 'Scent' from the small bottle little by little and mix it well. Keep mixing it well for 10 minutes

steps.title: Add Remaining Water
steps.instruction: Pour the remaining 16 liters of water and keep mixing it

steps.title: Add G-Sald Powder
steps.instruction: Pour the 'G-Sald Powder' little by little and mix it for a while. You will feel it becoming a good consistency

steps.title: Add Color
steps.instruction: Mix the 'Color Powder' with 1/2 liter of water, pour it little by little, and keep mixing for a while

steps.title: Second Rest Period
steps.instruction: Keep it in a safe place for 6 hours

steps.title: Final Product
steps.instruction: After 8 hours, a good thick and clear 'Washing Gel Liquid' is ready

liquid_detergent_smart.name: Liquid Detergent Smart
liquid_detergent_smart.description: Large volume liquid detergent kit for commercial production

steps.title: Add Base Paste
steps.instruction: Put the 'paste' from the 'Liquid Detergent Smart' kit into a 100 liter barrel

steps.title: Add Additives
steps.instruction: Add 'Scent' and 'Thickener Powder' to the paste and mix well

steps.title: Add Thickener Liquid
steps.instruction: Pour 'Thickener Liquid' into it and mix well

steps.title: First Water Addition
steps.instruction: Pour 10 liters of RO water into it and mix well

steps.title: Second Water Addition
steps.instruction: Pour 10 liters of RO water again and mix well

steps.title: Final Water Addition
steps.instruction: Pour the remaining 30 liters of RO water into it and mix well

steps.title: Foam Settlement
steps.instruction: The liquid in the barrel will be full of foam. Wait for the foam to settle

steps.title: Add Color
steps.instruction: Mix the 'Color Powder' with RO water, then pour it in little by little and mix it

steps.title: Add Salt for Thickness
steps.instruction: Add the 'Salt' from the 'Liquid Detergent SMART' Kit and mix it until it dissolves well. It will become thick in a while

steps.title: Final Product
steps.instruction: The 55 liters of 'Liquid Detergent SMART' is now ready

dish_wash_ultra.name: Dish Wash Liquid Ultra
dish_wash_ultra.description: Professional grade dish wash liquid kit with superior cleaning power

steps.title: Prepare Small Bucket
steps.instruction: Pour 2 liters of RO water in a small bucket

steps.title: Prepare Large Bucket
steps.instruction: Pour 4 liters of water in a large bucket

steps.title: Mix Caustic (Careful!)
steps.instruction: Add the 'caustic powder' from the kit to the small bucket (safely, as it is powerful) and mix well for some time using a plastic stick
steps.warning: Handle with extreme care - caustic is dangerous

steps.title: Add Acid Slurry
steps.instruction: In the large bucket (with 4 liters of RO water), pour 2 liters of 'Asis Sileri' (Acid Slurry) from the can and mix it

steps.title: Cool Down Period
steps.instruction: Keep both the buckets aside for 3 hours (wait until the hot solution reaches normal temperature)

steps.title: Combine Solutions
steps.instruction: After 3 hours, pour the 'caustic lye' (caustic powder mixture) from the small bucket into the large bucket and mix it well

steps.title: Second Rest Period
steps.instruction: Leave the large bucket as it is for 3 more hours

steps.title: Add SLES Paste
steps.instruction: After 3 hours, add the 'SLES paste' and mix it well

steps.title: Add CDA
steps.instruction: Pour the 'CDA' from the kit into it and mix it well

steps.title: Add Scent
steps.instruction: Pour the 'Scent' into it and mix it well

steps.title: Add Remaining Water
steps.instruction: Pour the remaining 14 liters of RO water in it and mix it well for a while

steps.title: Add Citric Powder
steps.instruction: Add the 'Citric Powder' little by little and mix it well for a while

steps.title: Add Thickener
steps.instruction: Add the 'Thickener Powder' little by little and mix it well

steps.title: Foam Settlement
steps.instruction: Leave it for 6 hours until the foam has settled

steps.title: Add Color
steps.instruction: After 6 hours, mix the 'color powder' with a little RO water (1/4 liter). Then pour the required amount of color into the big bucket, little by little, and mix it well

steps.title: Final Product
steps.instruction: The 'Dish Wash Liquid Ultra' is now ready

recipe.final_result: 23 liters of premium dish wash liquid

floor_cleaner_ultra.name: Floor Cleaner Ultra
floor_cleaner_ultra.description: Premium floor cleaner kit with excellent fragrance and cleaning power

steps.title: Add SLES Paste
steps.instruction: Put the SLES paste from the kit into the bucket

steps.title: Add AOS
steps.instruction: Pour 1 liter of 'AOS' into it and mix it with a plastic stick

steps.title: Add Scent
steps.instruction: Pour 'SCENT' into it and mix it well for a while. It will now turn into a 'paste'

steps.title: Add Water Gradually
steps.instruction: Pour 20 liters of RO water little by little and mix it completely. The bucket will be foamy

steps.title: Rest Period
steps.instruction: Leave it for 6 hours

steps.title: Check Foam Settlement
steps.instruction: After 6 hours, the resulting bucket will be free of foam

steps.title: Add Color
steps.instruction: Mix the 'color powder' with a little water and mix it while pouring it in little by little

steps.title: Final Product
steps.instruction: The good-smelling 'Floor Cleaner Liquid ULTRA' is now ready

recipe.final_result: 20 liters of premium floor cleaner with excellent fragrance

floor_cleaner_smart.description: Large volume floor cleaner kit for commercial production

steps.title: Add Base Paste

steps.title: Add Additives

soap_oil.name: Soap Oil
soap_oil.description: Economical soap oil production kit for large volume manufacturing

steps.title: Initial Water Setup
steps.instruction: Pour 20 liters of RO water in a 100 liter barrel

steps.title: Add Soda Ash
steps.instruction: Pour the 'Soda Ash Powder' from the 'Soap Oil Kit' into it and mix it well. The powder will turn into small lumps

steps.title: Break Lumps
steps.instruction: Break the lumps well with a big plastic stick and mix them well

steps.title: First Wait Period
steps.instruction: Wait for 4 hours

steps.title: Add Acid Slurry
steps.instruction: After 4 hours, pour the 'Asis Sileri' (Acid Slurry) into it little by little and mix it. It will boil like milk

steps.title: Cool Down
steps.instruction: Leave it for a while (15 minutes is enough)

steps.title: Add Remaining Water
steps.instruction: Pour the remaining 30 liters of RO water into it and mix well

steps.title: Add Thickener
steps.instruction: Add the 'Thickener Powder' from the 'Soap Oil Kit' and mix it until it dissolves well

steps.title: Add Color
steps.instruction: Mix the 'Color Powder' with some RO water and pour it little by little according to the color needed, and mix it

steps.title: Final Rest
steps.instruction: Leave it for 6 hours

steps.title: Final Product
steps.instruction: After 6 hours, the 55 liters of 'Soap Oil' is ready

phenyl_compound.name: Phenyl Compound
phenyl_compound.description: Simple and economical phenyl compound production kit

steps.title: Add Base Compound
steps.instruction: Pour the 'Phenyl Compound' from the kit into a 50 liter barrel and mix it well

steps.title: Add Water
steps.instruction: Pour 40 liters of RO water into it and mix it well

steps.title: Final Product
steps.instruction: The good-smelling 'Phenyl Compound' is ready

business_info.support: Complete recipe guidance and technical support provided

general_faqs.question: What water should I use for all recipes?
general_faqs.answer: Always use RO (Reverse Osmosis) water for best results. Tap water may affect the quality and consistency of the final product.

general_faqs.question: Can I scale up or down the recipes?
general_faqs.answer: Yes, but maintain the exact ratios. For scaling, calculate proportionally. We recommend starting with the standard kit size first.

general_faqs.question: How long do the finished products last?
general_faqs.answer: Most products have a shelf life of 12-18 months when stored properly in clean, sealed containers away from direct sunlight.

general_faqs.question: Do you provide technical support?
general_faqs.answer: Yes, we provide complete technical support including video tutorials, troubleshooting guides, and phone consultation.

general_faqs.question: What safety precautions should I take?
general_faqs.answer: Always wear gloves, work in ventilated areas, handle caustic materials carefully, and keep products away from children. Follow all safety instructions provided with kits.

too_thin.solution: Add thickener powder gradually while mixing. Let it rest for 30 minutes to achieve proper consistency.

too_thick.solution: Add small amounts of RO water while mixing until desired consistency is achieved.

poor_fragrance.solution: Ensure scent is added after cooling. Mix scent with small amount of product first, then add to main batch.

color_issues.solution: Always pre-mix color powder with water. Add gradually while mixing continuously. Test small batch first.

foam_problems.solution: Allow longer settling time (up to 12 hours). Avoid over-mixing once water is added.
